manifest.name: Cyberstition – Trust Signals
manifest.description: Privacy-first scam detection guide that helps users identify phishing, fraud, and deception through context-aware, guided analysis.

shortcutScan.name: Guided Scan
shortcutScan.description: Start a new guided scam scan

home.heroSubtitle: Identify scams, fake profiles, manipulated images, and suspicious emails using on-device analysis. All processing happens locally—no data collection, no tracking.
home.availableToolsDesc: All tools are available in the app after purchase. Download to get started.
home.toolMessageDetectiveDesc: Detect scam, phishing, and AI-generated message patterns.
home.toolProfileCheckerDesc: Verify social profile authenticity and identify deception signals.
home.toolImageInspectorDesc: Inspect metadata and detect manipulation indicators in images.
home.toolEmailAnalyzerDesc: Analyze email headers for spoofing and routing anomalies.
home.getStartedDesc: Try the app with a free demo, then unlock all analysis tools with a one-time purchase—no subscription. Try before you buy.
home.guidedScanIntro: Our intelligent analysis system guides you through comprehensive scam detection. Add evidence piece by piece while the system detects patterns, finds inconsistencies, and builds a confidence-rated risk assessment.
home.contextAwareDesc: Analyzes based on how you received it
home.questionSubtitle: Cyberstition helps you identify phishing, fraud, and deception through intelligent analysis. All processing happens locally in your browser—no data collection, no tracking, complete privacy.
home.privateDesc: All analysis runs on your device. Nothing leaves your browser. No data collection, no tracking.
home.oneTimeDesc: No subscription required. Pay once, use forever. Better value than monthly subscriptions.
home.noAccountDesc: Start using immediately. No sign-up, no email required. Maximum privacy.
home.worksOfflineDesc: Once loaded, all tools work without internet. Perfect for sensitive content.
home.step1Desc: Tell us where you received it and what they're asking
home.step2Desc: Analyze messages, profiles, emails, or images—system guides you
home.step3Desc: System identifies threat patterns and cross-references signals
home.step4Desc: Receive confidence-rated risk score with clear recommendations
home.messageDetectiveExample: Quick analysis of message text for scam patterns.
home.profileCheckerExample: Checks profile age, follower ratios, activity patterns, and verification status
home.imageInspectorExample: Detects editing software, creation dates, GPS location, and manipulation indicators
home.emailAnalyzerExample: Analyzes SPF, DKIM, DMARC records and routing paths to detect spoofing
home.individualToolsNote: Individual tools provide single-signal analysis. For comprehensive assessment, use Guided Scan.
home.highLevelIndicators: High-level indicators only. Always verify before acting.
home.yourHistoryDesc: All scan sessions and individual reports are saved to your dashboard. Review complete findings, pattern matches, confidence scores, and recommendations anytime.

dashboard.title: Analysis History
dashboard.subtitle: View and manage your saved reports and documents.
dashboard.ariaExportJson: Export all data as JSON backup
dashboard.noSessionsMatch: No scan sessions match "{{query}}". Try a different search term.
dashboard.noScanSessionsDesc: Start a new guided scan to analyze suspicious content. The guided workflow will help you through the analysis process.
dashboard.noReportsMatch: No reports match "{{query}}". Try a different search term.
dashboard.noReportsDesc: Reports from individual tool analyses will appear here. Try analyzing a message, email, image, or profile.
dashboard.noDocumentsMatch: No documents match "{{query}}". Try a different search term.
dashboard.noDocumentsDesc: Documents uploaded for analysis will appear here once saved.
dashboard.deleteReportConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this report?
dashboard.deleteDocumentConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this document?
dashboard.noReportsToExport: No reports to export. Please create some reports first.
dashboard.importReplaceConfirm: This will replace your current data. Continue?
dashboard.invalidBackupFormat: Invalid backup file. Please check the file format.

common.trustNoticeBody: Cyberstition runs on-device and does not collect personal data. It does not monitor accounts or block threats. Results are indicators only—always verify suspicious content through an independent channel.
common.nextStepsIntro: Select the content source to prioritize the next verification step.
common.originSummaryEmail: Email selected. Verify sender identity and header authenticity.
common.originSummaryProfile: Social profile selected. Verify profile authenticity and context.
common.originSummaryMessage: Direct message selected. Cross-check message content and sender identity.
common.originSummaryUnknown: Not sure. Start with the most common verification checks.
common.toolMessageDetectiveDesc: Analyze message content for scam and manipulation patterns.
common.toolProfileCheckerDesc: Verify profile authenticity and identify deception signals.
common.toolImageInspectorDesc: Inspect image metadata and detect manipulation indicators.
common.toolEmailAnalyzerDesc: Analyze email headers for spoofing and routing anomalies.

image.privacyBody: All analysis happens in your browser. Your image never leaves your device.
image.uploadHint: JPG, PNG, GIF, WebP up to 50MB • Or drag & drop • Or paste from clipboard
image.lookFor5: Always verify images through reverse image search

pricing.fullAccessThanks: You have full access to all features. Thank you for your purchase!
pricing.upgradeFromDemo: Upgrade from the demo version to unlock unlimited scans and all features. One-time payment, no subscription.
pricing.purchaseToAccess: Purchase the app to access all analysis tools. One-time payment, no subscription, no account required.
pricing.demoLimitsIntro: You're currently using the demo version with limited features:

patterns.phishing_classic_desc: Email or message requesting credentials with urgency and impersonation
patterns.romance_scam_early_desc: New profile with generic information showing interest
patterns.romance_scam_advanced_desc: Request to move conversation off-platform with urgency
patterns.investment_fraud_desc: Promise of high returns with urgency and minimal details
patterns.impersonation_brand_desc: Impersonating known brand or service to request action
patterns.suspicious_attachment_desc: Unusual file with urgency or reward promise
patterns.rule_urgency_pressure_desc: Time pressure combined with action request
patterns.rule_urgency_pressure_eval: Message uses time pressure to force quick action, common phishing tactic
patterns.rule_profile_message_mismatch_desc: Sender profile quality vs message content
patterns.rule_profile_message_mismatch_eval_high: Both sender profile and message content show high-risk indicators
patterns.rule_profile_message_mismatch_eval_mediu: Risk indicators in either sender profile or message content
patterns.rule_email_spoofing_eval: Multiple email authentication failures suggest sender spoofing

message.reason_link: Contains a link or short URL.
message.reason_impersonation: Mentions a brand/service in a way often used for impersonation.
message.reason_generic: Generic phrasing commonly used in mass-generated messages.

email.issue_reply_to: Reply-To present (can be normal; sometimes used in phishing).
email.issue_long_received: Long Received chain (not proof; could be routing).
email.rec_verify_sender: Verify the sender via a separate channel (official website/app), not by replying to the email.
email.rec_links_attachments: Be cautious with links and attachments, especially if the message creates urgency.
email.rec_from_domain: If possible, check the visible From name vs the actual domain and alignment results (SPF/DKIM/DMARC).

image.issue_uncommon_type: Uncommon image type (could be normal; still worth caution).
image.issue_large_size: Large file size compared to typical shared images.
image.issue_generic_filename: Filename looks generic (common for downloaded or reused images).
image.issue_no_proof: This tool does not prove authenticity. Missing metadata is not proof of manipulation.
image.rec_verify_source: If the image matters (money, safety, reputation), verify via the original source.
image.rec_visual_inconsistencies: Look for visual inconsistencies: lighting, edges around objects, and unnatural symmetry.
image.rec_urgency_payment: Be cautious with images that trigger urgency or requests for payment/credentials.

video.issue_uncommon_format: Uncommon video format (could be normal; still worth caution).
video.issue_large_size: Large file size compared to typical shared videos.
video.issue_generic_filename: Filename looks generic (common for downloaded or reused videos).
video.issue_short_duration: Very short video duration (could indicate quick scam recording).
video.issue_long_duration: Very long video duration (unusual for scam contexts).
video.issue_no_proof: This tool does not prove authenticity. Missing metadata is not proof of manipulation.
video.issue_deepfake: Deepfake detection requires specialized tools. Be cautious with video-based requests.
video.rec_verify_source: If the video matters (money, safety, reputation), verify via the original source.
video.rec_visual_inconsistencies: Look for visual inconsistencies: unnatural movements, lip-sync issues, and lighting problems.
video.rec_urgency_payment: Be especially cautious with videos that trigger urgency or requests for payment/credentials.
video.rec_reverse_search: Consider reverse image/video search to check if content has been reused.

profile.issue_bio_short: Bio is very short or generic.
profile.issue_followers_zero: Account follows many but has zero followers (can be a growth tactic, but worth caution).
profile.issue_high_followers_low_activity: High followers with very low activity (could indicate purchased followers).
profile.issue_bio_scam_phrases: Bio contains phrases commonly used in scam or promo profiles.
profile.issue_account_new: Account appears very new (if the age is accurate).
profile.rec_consistent_history: Check for consistent history: older posts, real interactions, and authentic engagement.
profile.rec_avoid_off_platform: Avoid moving conversations off-platform (e.g., WhatsApp/Telegram) until authenticity is clear.
profile.rec_verify_identity: Verify identity via a second channel if money, credentials, or sensitive info is requested.

about.title: About Cyberstition
about.intro: Cyberstition analyzes content on your device to identify deception and manipulation signals. It does not monitor accounts, block messages, or guarantee detection.
about.onDeviceDesc: All analysis runs locally in your browser—no server uploads.
about.privacyDesc: No data collection, tracking, or account monitoring.
about.indicatorsDesc: Results are signals to inform your judgment, not definitive proof.
about.verificationDesc: Always verify suspicious content through a separate channel.
about.faqPurchaseQ: How do I purchase the app?
about.faqPurchaseA: Download from the Play Store. One-time purchase, no subscription required.
about.faqAccuracyQ: How accurate are the risk indicators?
about.faqAccuracyA: Cyberstition provides risk indicators based on common patterns and signals. These are not guarantees—they help inform your judgment. Always verify suspicious content through independent channels. False positives and false negatives are possible.
about.faqThreatsQ: What types of threats does it detect?
about.faqThreatsA: Cyberstition analyzes messages for phishing, scam patterns, and AI-generated manipulation. It checks social profiles for authenticity signals, inspects image metadata for manipulation indicators, and analyzes email headers for spoofing. It does not detect malware or block threats.
about.faqOfflineA: Yes! All analysis happens on your device. Once the app is loaded, you can use all tools without an internet connection. No data is sent to external servers.
about.faqDevicesA: Cyberstition works in modern browsers (Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge) on desktop and mobile devices. The app version is available on Android via the Play Store.
about.faqPrivacyA: Yes. All analysis runs on your device. No content, reports, or personal information is sent to any server. Reports are stored locally in your browser. Clearing browser data will remove saved reports.
about.faqRefundA: Refund policies are handled through the Play Store. Please refer to Google's refund policy for app purchases.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.intro: Cyberstition helps you detect online scams and manipulation attempts through multi-layered analysis and pattern recognition. Here's how our system protects you.
howItWorks.step1Desc: Tell us about the suspicious content. Where did you receive it? Who sent it? What are they asking for? This context helps us understand the situation better.
howItWorks.step2Desc: Submit different types of evidence for analysis: message text, email headers, images, or profile information. The more evidence you provide, the more accurate our assessment.
howItWorks.step3Desc: Get a comprehensive risk assessment with detailed findings, pattern matches, and actionable recommendations on what to do next.
howItWorks.toolsIntro: We use four specialized analyzers to examine different aspects of suspicious content:
howItWorks.toolMessageDesc: Scans message text for urgency tactics, manipulation patterns, suspicious requests, and common scam phrases used to pressure victims.
howItWorks.toolEmailDesc: Examines email routing paths, sender authentication, and technical headers to detect spoofing, phishing attempts, and impersonation.
howItWorks.toolImageDesc: Inspects image metadata, editing history, and properties to identify manipulated images, fake documents, and stolen photos.
howItWorks.toolProfileDesc: Analyzes social media profiles for fake account indicators like suspicious follower ratios, account age, posting patterns, and authenticity markers.
howItWorks.patternsIntro: Our system identifies known scam patterns across multiple threat categories:
howItWorks.privacyDesc: All analysis happens locally in your browser. Your data never leaves your device unless you explicitly choose to save sessions. We don't track, collect, or store your sensitive information.
howItWorks.riskIntro: Each analysis produces a comprehensive risk score based on multiple factors:
howItWorks.riskLowDesc: Limited risk indicators found. Content appears legitimate but always verify through trusted channels.
howItWorks.riskMediumDesc: Concerning patterns detected. Proceed with caution and verify sender identity through independent channels.
howItWorks.riskHighDesc: Strong scam indicators detected. Do not proceed with requested actions. Block and report the sender.
howItWorks.featurePrivateDesc: All data stays on your device
howItWorks.ctaDesc: Start analyzing suspicious content now with our guided scan workflow.

toolsPage.title: Analysis Tools
toolsPage.intro: Use these specialized tools to analyze different types of suspicious content. Each tool focuses on specific indicators and patterns.
toolsPage.messageDesc: Analyze message text for scam patterns, urgency tactics, and manipulation techniques
toolsPage.emailDesc: Check email authenticity, routing paths, and spoofing indicators
toolsPage.imageDesc: Inspect image metadata, editing history, and manipulation indicators
toolsPage.profileDesc: Verify social media profiles for fake account indicators and suspicious patterns
toolsPage.proTipDesc: For the most comprehensive analysis, use the Guided Scan workflow. It automatically recommends which tools to use based on your situation and combines results for better accuracy.

more.title: More
more.subtitle: Quick access to information and settings.
more.homeDesc: Return to the overview and access all tools.
more.toolsDesc: Quick access to all 4 specialized analyzers in one place.
more.howItWorksDesc: Learn how Cyberstition analyzes content and detects scams.
more.aboutDesc: Learn about Cyberstition and our mission.
more.dashboardDesc: View and manage your saved reports and documents.

account.title: Preferences
account.subtitle: Configure your analysis preferences and settings.
account.fullAccessDesc: You have full access to all features. Thank you for your purchase!
account.privacyFirstDesc: All data is stored locally on your device. No information is collected or transmitted to external servers. Your privacy and security remain under your control.
account.preferencesSubtitle: All settings are stored locally on your device.
account.autoSaveDesc: Automatically save analysis reports to your dashboard.
account.riskWarningsDesc: Display detailed warnings for high-risk content.
account.historyDaysDesc: Retain analysis history for the selected number of days.
account.purchaseUpgradeDesc: Upgrade for unlimited scans and all features
account.purchaseNewDesc: Get full access with a one-time purchase
account.restorePurchasesDesc: Restore your purchase if you've already bought the app
account.localStorageDesc: Reports, documents, and preferences are stored only in your browser's local storage. No data is transmitted to any server. Clearing your browser data will remove all saved information.
account.securityTip3: Clear data when using shared devices
account.securityTip4: Back up important reports if needed
